EmailTemplate.name: OLD 04. Learning Plan Phase 2: WEX Onboarding
EmailTemplate.subject: Your WEX Onboarding Learning Plan
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Continue on the WEX Sales Learning Journey!
The Global Sales Training Team has developed this Phase 2 Learning Plan to build on your learning in Sales Onboarding. These modules will be continue your growth as part of the WEX team.
Your Learning Plan can be found in https://wexinc.skillport.com/skillportfe/login.action by clicking the View Learning Plan hyperlink. Please complete your Learning Plan within 30 days of hire.
Email Sales Training with any questions regarding Skillport or your Learning Plan.
Thank You, {!User.Name}
WEX Global Sales Training
